text: When I notice tax costs in purchases, I recognize them and choose to calculate and understand the full cost instead.
During moments when making financial decisions, I notice it and choose to consider tax impact and plan ahead instead.

I let not being able to understand tax costs prevent me from calculating and planning financial decisions effectively.
